0.subtitle: Do you want to study abroad and intern in Brazil? Click the image to watch our program video and see why you should be a part of the Portuguese Flagship program at UGA.
0.title: Get on board the Flagship

1.subtitle: UGA Flagship students enjoying an excursion to Santo Antônio de Lisboa while studying abroad in Florianópolis.
1.title: Summer 2018 in Florianópolis

2.subtitle: The fifth cohort of PFP students arrived in Brazil in February, 2017 for their Capstone Year. The Overseas Program consists of intensive Portuguese instruction at UFSJ, an internship in a field related to each student’s major, and immersion in Brazil’s vibrant culture.
2.title: The Fifth Cohort is in Brazil

3.subtitle: In this increasingly global economy, learning a new language can boost your chances at landing a lucrative job. Watch here why Portuguese is one of the best languages for you to learn.
3.title: Best Languages for Your Career

4.subtitle: The University of Georgia’s unique Portuguese Flagship Program has received approximately $3 million to continue for another 4 years.
4.title: The PFP Renewal is recognized by Red & Black

5.subtitle: Portuguese immersion for eight weeks in the beautiful Brazilian island city of Florianópolis. The program consists of individual housing, cultural activities in Florianópolis, excursions to Balneário Camboriú, Blumenau and Itajai River, and Serra Catarinense, and much more.
5.title: Flagship and FLAS in Florianópolis

6.subtitle: The Dean of International Affairs of UFSJ, Dr. Liliane de Assis Sade, together with former UFSJ President, Dr. Valeria Kemp, and the Overseas team of faculty and staff welcome new PFP students. Click on this video to learn more.
6.title: UFSJ Welcomes Our Stuents

7.subtitle: Portuguese Flagship Students have the opportunity to intern in a variety of organization located in Brazil. These internship opportunities provide students with hands-on experience in their field of study and potential future work environments. Click to learn more.
7.title: PFP Internship opportunities

8.subtitle: The third cohort of PFP students arrived in Brazil in February 2015 and returned from their Capstone Year in December 2015. After studying at  UFSJ, each of the fourteen members of this cohort participated in a challenging and customized internship in cities all across Brazil.
8.title: The Third Cohort Is Back

9.subtitle: Click here to learn more about the Flagship Program from the students’ perspective at the 2013 Final Capstone Meeting in Minas Gerias.
9.title: The First Cohort Shares Their Experience
